channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: More human remains from Philadelphia’s 1985 MOVE bombing have been found at a museum
item.description: More human remains from a 1985 police bombing on the headquarters of a Black liberation group in Philadelphia have been found at the University of Pennsylvania.

item.title: Ford agrees to pay up to $165 million penalty to US government for moving too slowly on recall
item.description: Ford Motor Co. will pay a penalty of up to $165 million to the U.S. government for moving too slowly on a recall and failing to give accurate recall information.

item.title: Bohannan requests a recount in Iowa’s close congressional race as GOP wins control of House
item.description: The Democrat looking to unseat an incumbent Republican in a close Iowa congressional race has asked for a recount.
